title: Invincible Saint ~Salaryman, the Path I Walk to Survive in This Other World~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Age Regression   Beastkin   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Dragons   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elves   Game Elements   Gods   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Healers   Lack of Common Sense   Late Romance   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   R-15   Religions   Salaryman   S*aves   Spirits   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Timid Protagonist   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Broccoli Lion   ブロッコリーライオン
description:
One day, Earth’s God of Destiny, and Galdardia’s Chief God had a bet.

The God of Destiny lost, and chose ten mediocre souls to hand over.

To those ten souls, the Chief God of Galdardia handed them new vessels.

And amongst those mediocre souls was one salaryman who fought against his destiny of death.

How will this man grow from now on?.>
